name: STEVENTALE (Proof of Concept)
description:
GAMEJOLT PAGE: https://gamejolt.com/games/sutale/576558

In this Undertale inspired story, Steven has his own adventure in the underground, will he make it long enough to get back into the surface?

Q&A:

Q: What makes it different than Undertale?

A: The enemies in the game star as Steven Universe characters, there is a new battle system, new locations, and a new magic mechanic!

Art (not sprites) by:

@Swagboy2000YT 

#fangame #undertale #rpg
